Title: OMV agrees 10-year deal for 1 mtpa of LNG from BP, starting from 2026
Description: Austrian integrated oil and gas firm OMV has agreed a deal to buy 1 mtpa of LNG over 10 years from BP as part of a move to diversify its gas supply sources and ensure supply security for its customers in Europe, including Austria. Supplies will come from BPâ€™s global portfolio and will be delivered from 2026.
Author: CK
